headline: Adobe Appoints Louise Pentland as Chief Legal Officer
summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., May 14, 2025--Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) today announced the appointment of Louise Pentland as Chief Legal Officer and Executive Vice President. Pentland will report directly to Chair and CEO Shantanu Narayen and will lead the Legal and Government Relations team responsible for overseeing global legal and policy matters.

raw.headline: Adobe Appoints Louise Pentland as Chief Legal Officer
raw.summary: SAN JOSE, Calif., May 14, 2025--Adobe (Nasdaq:ADBE) today announced the appointment of Louise Pentland as Chief Legal Officer and Executive Vice President. headline: Adobe Stock Is a Buy. One Portfolio Manager Explains Why.
summary: Who needs to pay for an Adobe subscription when free tools exist?  Adobe is still the No. 1 tool for editing, with its AI tool Firefly offering control at the pixel level.  Not to mention that while AI can often feel like the Wild West, Adobe’s products are trained on ethically sourced data with proper licensing: That means the images it creates can be used for commercial purposes.

headline: Wall Street Analysts Look Bullish on Adobe (ADBE): Should You Buy?
summary: Based on the average brokerage recommendation (ABR), Adobe (ADBE) should be added to one's portfolio. Wall Street analysts' overly optimistic recommendations cast doubt on the effectiveness of this highly sought-after metric. So, is the stock worth buying?
